title: PLS HELP ME
body: My game keep send error code 004 or something it make my client cant run and stop running!!!!{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Hey there, this error usually results from a network issue disconnecting from our services.  Run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix things up.
